1.title: A Family That Scares Together
1.plot: Caroline Manzo goes to the ends of the earth for her children, even if it means bonding over a midnight visit to a haunted prison. Chris is writing a young-adult novel and has dragged the entire family along on his research. Lauren tells Vito that sheâ€ôs unhappy, while Albie deals with approaching the age of thirty not even close to marriage. Later, Caroline is brought to tears during a conversation with Chris.

2.title: A Class in Creativity
2.plot: Lauren is opening up a second salon and hires her brother Chris to direct a commercial for her new business. Meanwhile, Albie gives his brother-in-law career advice when he insists Vito attend an etiquette class. Caroline seizes the opportunity to tag along on Vito's adventure, but how will she react when the teacher shames all three of them?

3.title: Planting a Seed
3.plot: Caroline decides she must find Albie a girlfriend and recruits Denise Scalia and Chris to scour local bars and grocery stores for suitable bachelorettes. When Albie learns about this scheme, his temper flares at their meddling. Elsewhere, Lauren and Vito butt heads about their living situation and discuss starting a family.

4.title: Craft Sales and Orgy Tales
4.plot: The Manzo men and Vito meet up with Greg Bennett for some boys bonding in Las Vegas. Caroline takes her soap-making hobby to NJ's Sugarloaf Craft Festival, where she realizes that she is in way over her head. Meanwhile, Lauren stews over frustrations about Vito leaving town during an important time for her. Chris and Albie both find themselves in sexy situations that have the entire group gasping in disbelief.

5.title: Newlywed Games
5.plot: Sick of hearing Lauren and Vito bicker over whose job is harder, Caroline calls for the newlyweds to swap jobs for the day. Meanwhile, Albie stresses that his career is taking too long to get off the ground, so he turns to his father for a heart-to-heart where he brings up a painful childhood memory.

6.title: For Better or Worse
6.plot: After success with her first crafts fair, the sky's the limit for Caroline aka "the Soap Lady." To move her business to the next level she has to lean on Albie for support. The pair pitches Caroline's soap to a major grocery store and this time Albie must tell Caroline what to do. Meanwhile, Lauren reaches her boiling point with Vito and gives her husband an ultimatum. Stricken with fear, Caroline seeks medical attention to determine what is wrong with her.

7.title: I'm Ovu-Leaving
7.plot: It's time for a Manzo family vacation to San Francisco! Everyone is in great spirits, with the exception of Lauren who has a bone to pick with her absent husband. Meanwhile, Chris downloads Greg on a secret that he has been keeping from the family. Later, when Caroline discovers that Lauren is keeping a secret, she confronts the issue head on in an emotional conversation.

8.title: California Dreaming
8.plot: The vacation continues on Lauren's birthday and Vito has pulled out all the stops to plan a special day. Much to Caroline's dismay, Vito booked a zip-lining excursion high above a beautiful vineyard. Caroline still fears the worst over an unresolved health issue. Meanwhile, Chris struggles to tell the family about his plans to move. Later, Caroline pursues her dream and co-hosts a talk show in Los Angeles.

9.title: Holy Bologna!
9.plot: Albie's consulting business is booming when he scores Vito a million-dollar meeting with an investor. Meanwhile, Lauren stresses about finances, and Chris has an awkward conversation with Caroline about his future that turns into tears.

10.title: Startling Surprises
10.plot: Caroline organizes a celebration for Albie's thirtieth birthday. Chris can't wait any longer to tell Albert that he plans to move. Meanwhile, Caroline waits for a doctor's call with her test results. Tension mounts between Albie and Vito, who have yet to resolve their huge blow up. And later, Caroline gives the family a dose of life-changing news.

1.title: The Princess Bride
1.plot: Lauren is approached to do a bridal dress photo shoot for a fashion website. Lauren becomes very nervous about her frequent armpit sweat and tries to put an end to it with botox treatments with Jacqueline's help despite Caroline's protest. Lauren's "bridesman", Greg Bennett, comes to visit and gives his opinion on the wedding dress.

2.title: The Flying Manzos
2.plot: Caroline and Al deal with the disruption of their sons, who turn out to be slobs, moving back into the house. In the midst of the chaos that is her full house, Caroline finds herself concerned about her weight and struggles to exercise. In order to get their mom feeling more confident about tackling her fears, Albie, Chris and Lauren convince Caroline to take a trapeze lesson.

3.title: Off to the Races
3.plot: Chris and Albie attempt to open a lavish new restaurant at the Meadowlands Race Track, but quickly learn the space isn't big enough to accommodate their vision. Albie's new girlfriend, Brittany, meets the family for the first time, much to Caroline's disapproval. Albie and Lauren disagree over the direction of Albie's life.

4.title: Brothers & Sisters
4.plot: After Albie tells his sister Lauren that he doesn't want to have a relationship with her, Caroline gives them 24 hours to make peace with each other. Meanwhile, Al Sr. has struck a deal to market a line of sauces based on Caroline's family recipes, but Caroline isn't sure if her recipe is good enough for the masses.

5.title: In Your Cafface
5.plot: In an effort to perfect her soon-to-be launched BBQ Sauce, Caroline and her family head down to Texas for a family vacation filled with BBQ meat, shots of whiskey and cowboys.

6.title: Secret Sauce
6.plot: Caroline and Al Sr. decide to spend their 30th anniversary touring the Hudson River on their brand new boat. While Lauren and Chris debate what to get their parents as a gift, Albie struggles with his relationship before getting some motherly advice from Caroline.

7.title: Tattoo Nightmare
7.plot: Caroline works with a design firm to create the label for her BBQ sauce line. Albie grows frustrated with Brittany when she's disrespectful about a gift he gives her. Faced with the decision of whether or not to break up with her, Albie considers getting a tattoo in an effort to break away from what's expected of him.

8.title: The Love Boat
8.plot: Caroline and Al Sr. decide to spend their 30th anniversary touring the Hudson River on their brand new boat. While Lauren and Chris debate what to get their parents as a gift, Albie struggles with his relationship before getting some motherly advice from Caroline.

1.title: Heavy Meddling
1.plot: It's a season of change for this Garden State clan. As Lauren and Vito prepare to tie the knot, Chris and Albie seek to develop separate identities. Chris has moved out to a bachelor pad in Hoboken while Albie focuses on work by pursuing a business opportunity in Colorado's booming cannabis industry. Sensing distance between her sons, Caroline makes it her mission to prevent her sons from going down the same unhealthy path that she and her sister Dina have taken. But will Mama Manzo's meddling drive her sons further apart? Meanwhile, Caroline reveals she invited Dina ...

2.title: Mama Manzo's Day
2.plot: Caroline cares about the future of Lauren and Vito and decides to give them finance advice. Chris thinks of a meaningful present to give to his mother; Albie remembers being kicked out of law school. The family later attends a Mother's Day brunch.

3.title: Introducing Bridezilla
3.plot: Caroline is fed up with her children acting too immature. Albie works on his love life. The Manzo children try to make peace with her mother while Lauren begins turning into a bridezilla and clashes with her mother.

4.title: Very Brittany Bridal Shower
4.plot: Energy in the Manzo House is nothing short of crazy as Caroline prepares to throw Lauren a picture perfect bridal shower. Albie courageously decides to invite his on-again girlfriend, Brittany, back into the Manzo fold for this special occasion, but his Aunt Jacqueline's remarks threaten to drive Brittany away. Meanwhile, Chris's colossal interruption stops the shower in its tracks.

5.title: Meat the Scalias
5.plot: Lauren's soon-to-be mother-in-law, Denise, pressures Lauren to behave like a Scalia-Stepford wife and when Vito's behavior takes a turn for the worse, Lauren realizes she may have bitten off more than she can chew with her soon-to-be hubby. When the Manzos and Scalias get together for dinner, jaw-dropping revelations leave the Manzos speechless. Meanwhile, Chris's latest professional endeavor proves to be child's play.

6.title: Brothers of the Bride
6.plot: After Albie tells his sister Lauren that he doesn't want to have a relationship with her, Caroline gives them 24 hours to make peace with each other. Meanwhile, Al Sr. has struck a deal to market a line of sauces based on Caroline's family recipes, but Caroline isn't sure if her recipe is good enough for the masses.

7.title: Dazed But Not Confused
7.plot: Eager to take Colorado's booming cannabis industry by storm, Albie drags Chris out west to do a little research for his budding business venture. The brothers tour a multi-million dollar grow house in attempt to further Albie's career goals, but once in the Mile-High city, Albie does some surprising soul-searching. Back on the east coast, Caroline and Albert Sr. prepare to reveal a secret to their children and the Scalias that will leave the entire group speechless.

8.title: The Tale of Two Families
8.plot: With their luggage (and emotional baggage) packed up, the Manzo and Scalia families head to Italy for some last minute bonding before the wedding. Although the trip is meant to be carefree, Albert Sr. immediately struggles with the gravity of losing his little girl, risking the vacation to be strained as this daddy-daughter duo navigates uncharted territory in their relationship. Meanwhile, Chris makes a shocking announcement that leaves Caroline utterly heartbroken.

9.title: Mama Mia!
9.plot: The Manzo-Scalia trip to Italy was intended to be full of family bonding, but instead it has the group buckling under pressure. Caroline steals Chris away for an important heart-to-heart, Albert Sr. continues to deal with surrendering his role as Lauren's "Number One Man." Vito's mother and Caroline upset Lauren so deeply that the bride-to-be storms away.

10.title: Emotional Baggage
10.plot: The Manzo and Scalia families head to an Italian countryside farm, but beautiful scenery and fresh food aren't the only things on everyone's mind. Chris and Albie are shocked when Vito reveals a secret that will change both families forever. Albert's emotional turmoil about losing his daughter becomes too much to bear, and his heartache is finally exposed. With the vacation coming to an end, Caroline makes a heartfelt speech intended to unite the families.

11.title: Embracing the Crazy
11.plot: After a chaotic year of wedding planning, Caroline is finally relishing the fact that all three of her children are on the track towards success...or so she thought. Although Christopher's career as an author has hit new heights and Lauren's wedding is days away, Caroline's state of bliss disappears suddenly when all attention turns to Albie. With both his professional and personal life in turmoil, Albie looks to a lawyer and a life coach to help get him out of trouble. And later, tension boils over when a very heated Caroline goes head to head against both Chris and ...

12.title: Do You Take, the Manzo Family?
12.plot: After a year and a half of wedding planning, Caroline and Albert must finally face the day when Lauren Manzo becomes Lauren Scalia. The house is a buzz with last minute wedding preparations, but not everything is smooth sailing. Albie must make a final decision about the fate of his relationship with Brittany, Lauren tells Caroline something that forces her mother into tears and Vito confesses to being extremely nervous. Later, while in route to the church, Lauren insists they take an unexpected detour. Will Vito buckle under pressure when Lauren, Caroline and Al Sr. ...

imdb.title: Manzo'd with Children
plot: The series follows the daily life of Caroline Manzo and her family.
